name: Reinaldo Ferraz
description: A smart developer and probably the one person who tinkers with their website as much as I do.

description: A smart developer and probably the one person who tinkers with their website as much as I do.

name: Cory Dransfeldt
description: A smart developer and probably the one person who tinkers with their website as much as I do.

name: Keenan
description: A very smart and handsome friend who has an incredible way with words.

name: David Daaaaaarnes
description: Dave posts about front end web things including lots of web component things.

name: Adam Newbold
description: The creator of omg.lol who has to write more stuff if I list him here.

name: Zoe Aubert
description: My friend and colleague who posts about all sorts including type systems, Warhammer, and Lego.

name: Sophie Koonin
description: A developer who has an incredible website (check out the early 00s theme) and brings back the fun of the web.

name: Martin Feld
description: One third of Hemispheric Views, Martin posts sporadically but they're always bangers.

name: Joe Steel
description: Joe is a VFX artist and blogs about various media things, most notable about how terrible the Apple TV is (it is terrible).

name: Lewis Dale
description: Lewis is a fellow UK-based developer posting about development things as well as cycling.

name: Wade Urry
description: A friend and colleague posting about programming-related things and the occasional recipe.

name: fLaMEd
description: Posts about the open web and related topics and just look at that website. So good.

name: Matt Birchler
description: Matt is a blogger and YouTuber posting thoughtful things about technology, media, and everything in between.

name: Andrew Canion
description: One third of Hemispheric Views, Andrew posts about spreadsheets. And probably other things too.

name: Zach Leatherman
description: The creator of Eleventy who posts excellent articles about Eleventy, web components, and everything in between.

name: Marty Day
description: Marty is great at finding interesting articles and videos. Gorgeous website.
